entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening. Rain mixed with snow overnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm over higher terrain. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain mixed with snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain. Rain mixed with snow in the morning. Snow over higher terrain late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1400 metres in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Snowfall amount 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
